meanings.sent1: After the long hike, the tired hiker felt a deep ravenousness in his stomach.
meanings.sent2: The wolf's eyes gleamed with ravenousness as it spotted its prey in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The ravenousness of the kids at the birthday party made the cake disappear in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her ravenousness for knowledge led her to read every book in the library within a month.
meanings.sent5: The ravenousness of the storm clouds signaled an impending downpour.

meanings.sent1: The beggar's eyes reflected a look of ravenousness as he watched people pass by with food.
meanings.sent2: The ravenousness of the businessman for success drove him to work long hours every day.
meanings.sent3: The ravenousness of the squirrel for nuts was evident as it filled its cheeks to the brim.
meanings.sent4: Her ravenousness for power led her to make ruthless decisions in the pursuit of control.
meanings.sent5: The ravenousness of the crowd for the limited edition item caused chaos in the store.

meanings.sent1: The chef's ravenousness for trying new recipes led to unique and delicious dishes.
meanings.sent2: The cat's ravenousness for fish made it a skilled hunter near the river.
meanings.sent3: The ravenousness of the student for learning new things impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent4: His ravenousness for adventure took him to far-off lands in search of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The ravenousness of the plant for sunlight caused it to grow tall and strong.
